name: logic less
template:
• {{i}}: {{text}} - the {{i}} is rendered twice
    • {{unusedMarkerWillDisappear}}
result:
I'm not given in the data object! I'm rendered dynamically by a function!

  • 1: scope level 2 data - the 1 is rendered twice
  • 2: scope level 1 data - the 2 is rendered twice

name: wildcads - nested template block styled

the line start/end wildcards %ls & %le in the following syntax's pattern let the whole opening & closing lines disappear in the result
